About Me

Hi I'm Stefan, I'm 20 and I'm living in Lille (North of France)

More about me

Since I'm in middle School, I got IT as a hobby, there was no doubt that I was going to study in this area, and that's what I did !
Today, I decided to get more into web development and all around front-end. I do like hardwares but it's more something like a hobby that I do on side. On the professional plan I prefer a way more development.
I would describe myself as someone who smiles a lot, like to talk and exchange with people but I'm definitly passionate by IT. Oh and my biggest default I think is that I'm such a bad loser...

Internship in Auchan, Croix

Network intern during 2months - May 2017

During this internship at Auchan's head office, I've been in charge of the well working of the network (server) of the park of around 100 persons working there, I also had to help them if they needed and fix them problems. I did stuff such as installing pre-configured windows, updating it etc. As soon as someone had a problem related to their computer/network it was my job to fix it.
I also assited to meeting in common with another site in another city, had to do weekly reports and many others missions.

Internship in Mumatic

development inter during 2months - January 2018

In this internship I've been needed to do development.
I have been able to do my first a showcase website for a pharmacy, installed an IP telephony network using linux and GoAutoDial and finally an overview of the database mongoDB.

Volunterring Calgary Immigrant Educational Society

Teaching english during 2 months - January 2019

I went 2 months in Canada, more precisly in Calgary (Alberta) to meet my girlfriend but it was also a way for me to discover myself a bit more.
Having a bilingual level in English, I decided to test my skills by teaching kids in english (level 2) so they were knowing just words but not really able to make sentences.
That's also during this travel that I've made this website entirely.
This trip teached me how to live alone (cause it was the first time for me), moreover in a foreign country, and it gave me the chance to think about my future and what I wanted.
